The claim made by President Donald Trump: born residents in the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program being "40 years old, 41 years old" was fact-checked.
The expert: s verdict confirms that the claim is inaccurate, as DACA program eligibility is limited to individuals born after June 15, 1981, making the maximum age of participants 36 years old.
The Trump administration announced in 20: and discussions are ongoing in the White House and Congress regarding a potential bill to preserve the program before the March 5 deadline.
